entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
